messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 487
messages.msgSnippet: i dont know how big the chain is, but if you have a Hollywood Video nearby, listen to this.  home educators can get a VIT very important teacher card for
messages.messageBody:
i dont know how big the chain is, but if you have a Hollywood Video nearby,
listen to this. home educators can get a VIT "very important teacher" card
for free, which then allows us to borrow any video that we will use for
educational purposes! FREE! no charge, nothing, nada. pretty great
service, eh? they have travel videos, documentaries, and of course all the
regular stuff....
hope you can enjoy this too!
erin
